int fastint ( ) { char c ; int num = 0 ; c = getchar_unlocked ( ) ; while ( c == ' ' || c == '
' ) c = getchar_unlocked ( ) ; while ( c >= 48 && c <= 57 ) { num = num * 10 + c - '0' ; c = getchar_unlocked ( ) ; } return num ; } int main ( ) { int tc , n , i , j ; scanf ( "%d
" , & tc ) ; int ar [ 102 ] [ 102 ] ; while ( tc > 0 ) { for ( i = 0 ; i < 102 ; i ++ ) for ( j = 0 ; j < 102 ; j ++ ) ar [ i ] [ j ] = 0 ; scanf ( "%d
" , & n ) ; for ( i = 1 ; i <= n ; i ++ ) { for ( j = 1 ; j <= i ; j ++ ) { scanf ( "%d" , & ar [ i ] [ j ] ) ; } } for ( i = 1 ; i <= n ; i ++ ) { for ( j = 1 ; j <= i ; j ++ ) { int mx = ar [ i - 1 ] [ j - 1 ] > ar [ i - 1 ] [ j ] ? ar [ i - 1 ] [ j - 1 ] : ar [ i - 1 ] [ j ] ; ar [ i ] [ j ] += mx ; } } int mx = 0 ; for ( i = 1 ; i <= n ; i ++ ) { if ( ar [ n ] [ i ] > mx ) mx = ar [ n ] [ i ] ; } printf ( "%d
" , mx ) ; tc -- ; } return 0 ; }
